quoteText:
The Services are for use by a) individuals who own Visual Content.
b) entities that represent owners of Visual Content including but not limited to galleries, agents, representatives, distributors other market intermediaries.
and c) individuals and entities seeking to license Visual Content.
title: Open only to individual photographers and graphic artists

tosdr.tldr: “Accounts may not be opened by galleries, agents and other market intermediaries and entities who represent photographers and graphic artists or sell their works.”
